04_inferential_statistics/01_T_dist/01_T_probs_v1
  1. If \(n=34\), determine \(P(T<1.31)\).
  2. If \(n=22\), determine \(P(T>2.19)\).
  3. If \(n=22\), determine \(P(|T|<1.32)\).
  4. If \(n=11\), determine \(P(|T|>1.81)\).
  5. If \(n=8\), determine \(t\) such that \(P(T<t) = 0.99\).
  6. If \(n=10\), determine \(t\) such that \(P(T>t) = 0.025\).
  7. If \(n=16\), determine \(t\) such that \(P(|T|<t) = 0.99\).
  8. If \(n=22\), determine \(t\) such that \(P(|T|>t) = 0.1\).
